remarks: Convert an existential quantification over a pair to a disjunction. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
statement:
ralpr.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
ralpr.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
ralpr.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ralpr.4 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
rexpr $p |- ( E. x e. { A , B } ph <-> ( ps \/ ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ps x $.
